We organized a workshop at the TRB 2024 Annual Meeting sponsored by eight committees (ACP50, A0020C, AED10, AED50, ED60, AEP40, AEP50, AJE45).

**Workshop Highlights**
- Fundamental principles of reproducible research
- Practical implementation strategies
- Tools and best practices
- Multi-committee collaboration demonstrating broad interest

This successful workshop brought together transportation researchers and practitioners to advance reproducible research practices across multiple domains within the transportation field. More details [here](http://www.connectedandautonomoustransport.com/uploads/2/5/2/6/25268286/acp50-reproducible-research.pdf).
